description: Unique identifier for each listing.
notes: Primary key for joining with other tables.

description: The date when the data for this listing was collected.
notes: Useful for temporal analysis and versioning datasets.

description: Unique identifier for each host.
notes: Can be used to analyze host-level characteristics.

description: The date the host joined Airbnb.
Indicates if the host is a designated Superhost.
notes: Categorical feature ('t'/'f'). Needs to be converted to boolean or binary.

description: The specific neighborhood of the listing.
The borough or larger area the neighborhood belongs to.
The latitude of the listing.
The longitude of the listing.
The type of property (e.g.
column7: Key categorical feature for the 'Size/Capacity' axis.

description: The type of room offered (e.g.
column7: Key categorical feature for the 'Size/Capacity' axis.

description: The maximum number of guests the listing can accommodate.
notes: Core numeric feature for the 'Size/Capacity' axis.

description: A descriptive string for the bathroom count and type.
notes: Needs parsing to extract numeric value and type (private/shared).

description: The number of bedrooms.
notes: Core numeric feature for the 'Size/Capacity' axis. Can be null.

description: The number of beds.
notes: Core numeric feature for the 'Size/Capacity' axis. Can be null.

description: A JSON-formatted string listing all available amenities.
notes: A critical but complex feature for the 'Amenities' axis. Requires significant parsing or embedding.

description: The nightly price set by the host in USD.
notes: The primary target variable for the model. Stored as a string with '$', requires cleaning.

description: The minimum number of nights required for a booking.
notes: Important for understanding rental type (short-term vs. long-term).

description: The maximum number of nights allowed for a booking.
The total number of reviews the listing has received.
The date of the first review.
The date of the most recent review.
The overall rating of the listing (1-5).
notes: Key feature for the 'Reviews' axis. May have missing values.

description: The rating for cleanliness (1-5).
The rating for the check-in process (1-5).
The rating for host communication (1-5).
The rating for the location (1-5).
The rating for value (1-5).
Indicates if a guest can book the listing without host approval.
The average number of reviews per month.
